name: Adventures of Ice Cream and Cake
name_original: Adventures of Ice Cream and Cake
description:
A long time ago, two worlds, IceCreamus and Cakerra, collided. In the legends, it is said that a formula for fusing the two species was created, but was lost. You must find this recipe, get on top of your cake brother, and become one with him.

That's what she said.

Unfortunately, ya boy was only able to make a few levels before the deadline, but please, by all means, leave some feedback for me. I'll get to working on some more levels when I can. Thank you

Assets (modified) from:

IceCream - https://neon-frog-games-studio.itch.io/food-rush
Tiles - https://gatdesucre.itch.io/sugarland-tileset

Music: https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music
                https://spicylobster.itch.io/fish-world-pack
